text: Pangali chakanya pa jwangalola, pangali chakanya soni pa jwannemale, pangali chakanya soni pa jwakulwala, kapena soni pa mwachimisyene kuti n’dyeje m’majumba mwenu, kapena m’majumba ga achatati ŵenu, kapena m’majumba ga achachikulu ŵenu, kapena m’majumba ga achachimwene ŵenu, kapena m’majumba ga achachemwali ŵenu, kapena m’majumba ga achibaba ŵenu ŵanandi kapena ŵakulungwa, kapena m’majumba ga achibaba ŵenu ŵachikongwe, kapena m’majumba ga achin’jomba ŵenu, kapena m’majumba ga achimama ŵenu ŵanandi kapena ŵakulungwa, kapena ŵamwasunjile makiyi gao, kapena ajenu. Pangali chakanya pa jenumanja kuti n’dyeje nganya kapena jikajika. Sano pati nchijinjilaga m’majumba, basi peleganani salamu mwachimisyene (pakuŵecheta kuti: As-Salâm ‘Alaikum – Ntendele uŵe kukwenu) chilamuchilo chakuumila kwa Allah chachili chaupile soni chambone. Iyyoyopeyo Allah akusalichisya kukwenu ma Ȃya kuti jenumanja mmanyilile
